post_title: FS or TRADE ~ Cy (bare hand) raw
post_content:
Looking to either sell, trade, trade/cash my raw Cy Young bare hand. Nice big borders, good coloring and registration. It has a Sweet Cap 350/30 reverse. At one time it must’ve had a stamp of some sort affixed to it as it has remanants still on the card along with a little paper loss where someone tried removing whatever was affixed. Overall, it presents well. $775.00 cash or willing to look at T206 HOF off backs in trade. If interested, please shoot me a PM and I’ll email or text you pictures. I’m not super proficient with posting images on this site. Thanks for looking!

John
